name: Spring is in the Air
description:
Made in 3 days for the Unreal Engine Jam Spring 2017 with the theme Spring into Action.

Spring is in the Air is a strategy game about launching your flower's into battle using your Spring Powered Launcher™.

It is a game set during spring, where you launch flowers using a spring in order to fight to destroy your opponent's hot spring.

Made by: Team Springy McSpringFace and the Springs Sponsored by Spring Powered INC.

Team Members:
Art Lead/Float : Keith McNabb
Coding Lead : Philip Zimmermann
Project Manager/Designer : Sebastian Scaini
Sound Lead : Luigi Zaccagnini
Level Design : Hosein Mohamady
